Key.name: DefaultBotTick
Key.comment: The interval (ms) between two message dispatching

Key.name: EstimatedMovementLag
Key.comment: Refer to the estimated time elapsed until the client start moving (in ms)

Key.name: MapDecryptionKey
Key.comment: The decryption key used by default

Key.name: ServerConnectionTimeout
Key.comment: Timeout in seconds before closing the connection

Key.name: SettingsFile
Key.comment: Path of settings files, ?account? is replaced by the account name and ?character? by the character name. You must use them !

Key.name: FindDofusPathAuto
Key.comment: When true the dofus path will be find automatically
